text: John Crane (born April 7, 1935) is a Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Harbour Grace in the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly from 1989 to 1995. He is a member of the Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador.Encyclopedia of Newfoundland and Labrador He is a businessman. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Newfoundland and Labrador MHAs
title: John Crane (Canadian politician)
